## MapControlsUI.dispose() method

Destroy this \[\[MapControlsUI\]\] instance. Unregisters all event handlers used. This method should be called when you stop using \[\[MapControlsUI\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dispose(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void
